cmpt-mdevtools Mobile devtools component powered by vConsole and eruda.
Requirements FixIt v0.4.0 or later. eruda vConsole Install Component The installation method is the same as installing a theme. There are several ways to install, choose one, for example, install through Hugo Modules:
items.content_html:
cmpt-mdevtools

Mobile devtools component powered by vConsole and eruda.

Requirements

  • FixIt v0.4.0 or later.
  • eruda
  • vConsole

Install Component

The installation method is the same as installing a theme. There are several ways to install, choose one, for example, install through Hugo Modules:
